GSD.description:
rtl818x: Prevent using not initialized queues

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit b5dca2cd3f0239512da808598b4e70557eb4c2a1. For more details please see the references link.
